title: Sea
text: ENCYCLOPEDIC ENTRY ENCYCLOPEDIC ENTRY Sea Sea The “seven seas” has been used to describe the world’s great water bodies for a long time. But there are actually about 50 water formations that can be called a “sea,” and they are quite diverse when it comes to their size, location, and ecosystems. Grades 5 - 8 Subjects Earth Science, Oceanography, Geography, Physical Geography Image Greek Coast South Aegean An image of a tiny boat sailing away from the coast with a domed building in the lefthand forgroud and sharply rising cliffs in the background.
